text: Bertice Berry (born 1960) is an American sociologist, author, lecturer, and educator. She was born in Wilmington, Delaware and taught at Kent State University. She was the host and co-executive producer of her own nationally syndicated talk show, The Bertice Berry Show, from 1993 to 1994. Besides having her own talk show, Berry has also appeared on The Oprah Winfrey Show, The Tonight Show with Jay Leno, TEDx Talk, CBS Nightwatch, CNN's Crossfire, and Sonya Live.
